title: New Mangaverse: The Rings of Fate
description: The story they said would never be told! It's been a dark time since we last saw the Mangaverse. Most of the heroes have been driven underground - and now someone's killing them one by one! Join writer C.B. Cebulski (writer and consultant on the original Mangaverse comics) and artist Tommy Ohtsuka (from the super-popular manga and anime series Slayers and Rescue Angels) for nonstop action! Whether you're a fan of the original Mangaverse or just a fan of exciting comics, the New Mangaverse is the place to be!
